data.title: Westminster Under School
data.meta_description: The pages in this section provides details for admissions, specifically relating to 7+, 8+ and 11+ entry to Westminster Under School.
data.text: The pages in this section of the website provide details specifically relating to 7+, 8+ and 11+ entry to Westminster Under School, outlining the application process, registration timelines, eligibility criteria, fees and opportunities for assistance with fees (Bursaries and Scholarships), to ensure that parents of prospective pupils have everything needed to be able to apply for a place at the School. To support the application process, we have a dedicated and experienced admissions team, who are available to answer any questions applicant families may have and who make applying to the School easy and undaunting. It is important to note that those applying for 11+ entry to Westminster Under School cannot, at the same time, apply for 13+ entry to Westminster School. Details regarding transition to Westminster School can be found on each of the entry point pages. Find out when your child is able to apply to join the School and view the registration timeline using Westminster Schoolâ€™s registration age checker.
